Top Places to Visit in Faizabad (Ayodhya), Uttar Pradesh
content: Faizabad is a city in the Indian state of Uttar Pradesh, and forms a municipal corporation with Ayodhya. It is the headquarters of Faizabad District and Faizabad division. title: Top Places to Visit in Etawah, Uttar Pradesh
content: Etawah is a city on the banks of Yamuna River in the state of Uttar Pradesh in India. It is the administrative headquarters of Etawah District and is about 160 km west of Kanpur. title: Top Places to Visit in Etah, Uttar Pradesh
content: Etah is a municipality town which is also the district headquarters of Etah district of Uttar Pradesh state, India. title: Top Places to Visit in Deoria, Uttar Pradesh
content:
Deoria is a city in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. It is one of five tehsils of the Deoria district. Deoria is located 50 km to the southeast of Gorakhpur and about 310 km from the state capital Lucknow.

title: Top Places to Visit in Chitrakoot Dham (Karwi), Uttar Pradesh
content:
Chitrakoot Dham (Karwi) is district headquarters and a municipal board in Chitrakoot district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India.
History

title: Top Places to Visit in Chandauli, Uttar Pradesh
content: Chandauli is a town and a nagar panchayat in Chandauli district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. It is the administrative headquarters of Chandauli District. title: Top Places to Visit in Bulandshahr, Uttar Pradesh
content: Bulandshahr is a city and a municipal board in Bulandshahr district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. It is the administrative headquarters of Bulandshahr District. title: Top Places to Visit in Budaun, Uttar Pradesh
content: Budaun (also spelled as Badaun, formerly Vodamayuta) is a city and a seat of Budaun district, Uttar Pradesh, India. content:

Top Places to Visit in Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh
content: Bareilly (/bəˈrɛli/ (About this sound listen)) is a city in Bareilly district in the northern Indian state of Uttar Pradesh.
